mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_ID FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{userId} UNION SELECT user_id FROM KORTORY_USER WHERE user_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT gwan_ri_id FROM GWAN_RI WHERE gwan_ri_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT in_sa_id FROM IN_SA WHERE in_sa_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT ki_hoek_id FROM KI_HOEK WHERE ki_hoek_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT young_up_id FROM YOUNG_UP WHERE young_up_id = #{userId}
